data.author: Bloomberg
data.title: Indian bonds face hurdle as stocks lure savings, says ICICI Bank
data.description: Domestic investors bought more than $80 billion of stocks in 2025, driving a 10th straight year of gains in benchmark equity indexes despite record foreign outflows
data.content: Indian bonds have limited scope to rally as a shift in household savings to equities and changes to banks investment rules dampen demand for long-term debt, according to a senior executive at ICICI B… [+2462 chars]

data.author: Sasha Rogelberg, Nick Lichtenberg
data.title: Trump’s strike on Venezuela gives the U.S. 30% of the world’s oil reserves on paper and a $100 billion rebuilding job in reality
data.description: “I don't think any large U.S. major company is going to want to invest without a series of guarantees,” one historian of Venezuela said.
